name: Bazooka Cops
description:
(built for mobile, this is a PC build for showcase reasons)

A hilariously destructive and over the top action game that takes control of a member of the most brutally inefficient division of law enforcement - the Bazooka Cops, to complete a series of specialized missions.  
 
Using an intuitive, all-encompassing “tap to fire” mechanic, you will blast your enemies to pieces whilst the recoil propels you through each unique level.
 
By completing set objectives on each stage you will accumulate badges which will grant access to higher stakes missions.
